errors.name: CELLBOARD_ID
errors.description: error set when the cellboard identifier cannot be read correctly

errors.name: POST
errors.description: a problem raise during the Power On Self Test

errors.name: UNDER_VOLTAGE
errors.description: a cell voltage value is too low

errors.name: OVER_VOLTAGE
errors.description: a cell voltage value is too high

errors.name: UNDER_TEMPERATURE
errors.description: a cell temperature value is too low

errors.name: OVER_TEMPERATURE
errors.description: a cell temperature value is too high

errors.name: CAN
errors.description: CAN bus communication is not working
